body_html:
The tensorflow/serving project still says we need to run ./configure to be able to build tensorflow: https://github.com/tensorflow/serving/blob/master/tensorflow_serving/g3doc/setup.md

Is there any example of anyone using tensorflow with bazel without running ./configure? We just tried and it fails because it can't find these files: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/git/BUILD#L10
body_text:
The tensorflow/serving project still says we need to run ./configure to be able to build tensorflow: https://github.com/tensorflow/serving/blob/master/tensorflow_serving/g3doc/setup.md
Is there any example of anyone using tensorflow with bazel without running ./configure? We just tried and it fails because it can't find these files: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/git/BUILD#L10
body:
The tensorflow/serving project still says we need to run ./configure to be able to build tensorflow: https://github.com/tensorflow/serving/blob/master/tensorflow_serving/g3doc/setup.md

Is there any example of anyone using tensorflow with bazel without running ./configure? We just tried and it fails because it can't find these files: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/git/BUILD#L10
